channel.title: SF UI Font Fixer
channel.description: A Sketch plugin that adjusts the character spacing on text layers using iOS 9's SF UI Text/SF UI Display fonts to what it would be when used in an iOS app.

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description:
A Sketch plugin that adjusts the character spacing on text layers using iOS 9's SF UI Text/Display fonts to what it would be when used in the app.

E.g. If you use SF UI Text at 16pt the script will set this layer's character spacing to -0.32.
